titleStmt.title: A midnights trance wherin is discoursed of death, the nature of the soules, and estate of immortalitie. As it was written at the desire of a nobleman, by W.D.
titleStmt.author: Drummond, William, 1585-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Purslow, for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at the signe of the Greene-Dragon in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 6182 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Greene-Dragon in Paules Church-yard
